attributes.action: Defend the historic British Union and all it has stood for these past three centuries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unionists unite

Some of you reading this may think I am a person from Northern Ireland, with all its grim history, who supports continuing Union with the British state. I am not. I am not English, Irish Scottish or Welsh-I am British in an age when Britishness is a dying concept. Throughout this nation, 400 years of the history of a unified nation, arguably the world’s greatest nation, is being destroyed. Futhermore, I support peacefull Irish Unionism
